item.description:
UPDATE July 23rd:

Harry Potter: Please look for Kristina in front of Chatters. She looks exactly like her picture. Since I am seeing Horrible Bosses, I may not get there for the earlier HP movie time.

Food/Drinks: Based on feedback, we will be going to Boston's Gourmet Pizza, 1436 Pleasant Valley Road, Manchester, very close to the theater off of Buckland. They are open until 2:00 AM and have a wide variety of food besides pizza. (Carrabba's closes at 11:00, and with such a large group of us getting there between 9:30 and 10:00, I don't want to feel rushed to eat/drink/socialize and let them clean up and go home.)

http://www.bostons.com/uploaded/file/menus/mainmenu/4D_Menu.pdf

 

UPDATE JULY 21st:

I took a poll in the Get a Life group and it was 3 to 1 in favor of the regular theater rather than IMAX 3D. For anyone interested in seeing Horrible Bosses, I have included that info as well. Both movies let out only 20 minutes apart so we can go out to eat/drink together after. 

Harry Potter 7:20 Start: Meet at 7:00 in front of Chatters Bar inside the theater. We will be going into the theater by 7:10. It is strongly suggested that you buy your tix in advance online (or get there before 7:00 to wait in line and hope they don't sell out).

 

Horrible Bosses 8:10 Start:Meet at 7:50 (after you buy your tix) in front of Chatters Bar inside the theater. We will be going into the theater by 8:00. 

Food/Drinks:If the weather stays as hot & humid on Saturday night as they are now predicting, I am leaning toward indoor dining, rather than Shea's patio, for comfort (and some people's health). Could I get feedback on the meetup site on any preferences between Carrabba's or Boston Pizza (the only 2 suggestions so far)?

 

Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2

The end begins as Harry, Ron, and Hermione go back to Hogwarts to find and destroy Voldemort's final horcruxes, but when Voldemort finds out about their mission, the biggest battle begins and life as they know it will never be the same again.

  • Cast: Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint, Emma Watson
  • Director: David Yates 

http://harrypotter.warnerbros.com/harrypotterandthedeathlyhallows/mainsite/index.html

 

Horrible Bosses

Nick (Jason Bateman), Dale (Charlie Day) and Kurt (Jason Sudeikis) are workers who would like nothing better than to grind their oppressive employers into the dirt. Quitting their jobs is not an option, so -- fueled by alcohol and dubious advice from a criminal (Jamie Foxx) -- the men devise a complex and seemingly foolproof plan to permanently rid themselves of their terrible bosses. The problem is, any plan is only as clever as the brains behind it.

Cast: Jason Bateman, Jason Sudeikis, Charlie Day, Jennifer Aniston, Kevin Spacey, Jamie Foxx, Colin Farrell

Director: Seth Gordon

www.horriblebossesmovie.warnerbros.com​index.html/

 

This is a joint meetup with the Get a Life Group.  You can attend if you're a member of either.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in front of Chatters Bar inside the theater.
item.name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2 or Horrible Bosses
